entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
